title: Smeagol, Pitiable Guide (19P11)
text:
Set:	Ages End
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gollum
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Companion
Strength:	3
Vitality:	4
Resistance:	5
Game Text:	Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Each time Smeagol wins a skirmish, you may shuffle up to 2 [Gollum] cards from your discard pile into your draw deck. Skirmish: Exert a Ring-bound companion to make Smeagol strength +2.
Rarity:	P
